title: Bug 118780: Alias name not displayed correctly in expression builder when selecting dataset
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset and double-clicking the first column name, the alias name should be displayed instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to "column1".
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
5. Double-click on the first column name and observe the result.
